name: Faraz Alam
title: Full Stack Developer
summary: Experienced Full Stack Developer with 3+ years building enterprise applications for Fortune 500 companies. Specialized in Java/Spring Boot, Go microservices, iOS development, and cloud architecture with AWS. Strong background in performance optimization, machine learning integration, and test-driven development.
